Package it.polimi.ingsw.utilities

Class Log

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utilities.Log
public class Log extends Object
Main logging class. Writes all the data into a file named "client.log" or "server.log" according to the instance running and appends the logs to the already existing ones.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Log.Level
    Enumeration with all the possibile log levels (or severities).

  • Method Details

    • createClientInstance

      public static void createClientInstance() throws IOException, IllegalAccessException
      Creates a new instance for the client.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O exception occurs while creating the instance.
      IllegalAccessException - if the instance already exists.

    • createServerInstance

      public static void createServerInstance() throws IOException, IllegalAccessException
      Creates a new instance for the server.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O exception occurs while creating the instance.
      IllegalAccessException - if the instance already exists.

    • createInstance

      private static void createInstance(boolean server) throws IOException
      Internal method for generating the instance.
      Parameters:
      server - true if it's a server instance, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O exception occurs while creating the instance.

    • checkLevel

      private static boolean checkLevel(Log.Level level)
      Returns whether the log can be print or not according to the required severity level.
      Parameters:
      level - The level of the request.
      Returns:
      true if it can be print.

    • setLevel

      public static void setLevel(Log.Level level)
      Sets the logging level (default is WARNING).
      Parameters:
      level - The desired logging level.
